extendedInfo.description: Welcome to the mobile conference app for the AMLE 39th Annual Conference for Middle Level Education!  This is the worldâs largest event for middle grades educators, featuring more than 400 sessions in 60 topic areas. The event brings you inspirational keynoters John Medina and Jack Berckemeyer, unique networking opportunities, the best sessions on topics to help you teach and reach 10- to 15-year-olds, and hundreds of exhibits featuring companies with state of the art products and services for middle grades educators. This is a power-packed two and a half-day event that you canât afford to miss!The app features:-         iPhone, iPad, and Android-friendly for 24/7 access to session and scheduling information. No wifi connection required to access the information.-         View sessions by topic, presenter, and date for ease of reference.-         View âWhatâs going on right now.â-         View updates to sessions.-         Browse the sponsor and exhibitor list.-         Find a product or service in the Exhibit Hall, and mark your favorites.-         View maps to all conference venues at your fingertips.-         Connect and post to Twitter to share your experience.Take notes about sessions and new resources.-         Collect conference contacts.Tag will be #AMLE2012Search:  AMLE2012Key terms:  AMLE, Conference, Middle Level, NMSA, Middle School Conference, Education, Teaching
